CustomField.description: Basic Export Quote field will be displayed in Quote Actions Lightning Components
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Expired',TEXT(Apttus_Proposal__Approval_Stage__c)!='Closed(not won)'),IF(Roll_Up_Of_Proposal_Line_Item__c >0,IF( Reprice_In_Progress__c = true, null, IF(Quote_Type__c <> 'Direct CPQ', IF(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_Type__c = 'sCRM', ($CustomMetadata.CPQ_XAEApps__mdt.Basic_Quote_Export.CPQ_AppUrl__c + Id),(NokiaCPQ_Environment_Access_URL__c & $CustomMetadata.CPQ_XAEApps__mdt.Basic_Quote_Export.CPQ_AppUrl__c + Id)),null) ),null),null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Basic Export Quote field will be displayed in Quote Actions Lightning Components
CustomField.label: Basic Quote Export
